title: Gets the job done
comment: I'd probably miss a few presets. Absolutely +1 for not requiring additional permissions. Gets the job done

title: It's a timer...
comment: I mean, there's not much to say. It does what a timer should do. It really does what your stock timer probably already does. But I don't care. It does its job well, and that's what's important!
Thanks Erik!  That was the goal -- do one job well.

title: Wonderful
comment: It is wonderful again, thank you for the improvements!

title: Better after the last update
comment: Using it again, thanks for changing the UI back =)
Added all animations back!  Sorry for the bad update.

title: Thank you
comment: Mr. Gootee, thank you very much for giving me my teapot and cup back.  I like the scroll you added to set the time.  5 plus stars.                 Jackie
Thank you Jackie!

title: Very nice!
comment: Simple and works well!
Added all animations back!  Sorry for the bad update.

title: Pretty, functional, small
comment: What more could you ask for?
Added all animations back!  Sorry for the bad update.

title: Used this app for years.
comment: THE one and only tea timer app.

title: Lovely update
comment: The refreshed interface is quite nice and I'm glad it maintains the app's simplicity. However, after pressing Start, the two buttons underneath the timer are blank on my phone. Hope this gets addressed. Thanks for the update :)
Bugs with the blank button fixed!
If not broken don't fix
Agreed -- Added all animations back!  Sorry for the bad update.

title: Old one was way better.
comment: This one is nothing more than a timer that does not work.  I am deleting it.
Added all animations back!  Sorry for the bad update -- please give it another try

title: Broken Teapot
comment: The new update constantly stops working (with an error message) and NO MORE TEAPOT.
Added all animations back!  Sorry for the bad update.

title: I don't like the  new look!!!
comment: Please. Used this app for yrs. Bring back the old style, or give us the option to use either style.  May look for a new one closer to the old style. Not liking the update at all. If it's not broke, don't fix it
Agreed - Added all animations back!  Sorry for the bad update.

title: Sorry to see the update :(
comment: A shame that this update basically removed the charm and usability of the old interface and replaced it with a generic number readout that I can get with any number of applications. Very disappointed with this turn of events.
Added all animations back!  Sorry for the bad update.

title: Useless
comment: It does not do anything more than any timer. It is not tea related. I was expecting something that would suggest me brewing times for every kind of tea, but all I can do is set a timer, with hours (!!), minutes, seconds. It is nothing more than a timer with "tea" written on it.
Good point!  I took out the hours!

title: One thing done well!
comment: It's been on my phones since 2011. Regardless of the name, I use it every day when I need to time something. In the grand tradition of the simple tool that does one thing well.

title: Small integrated timer
comment: Works with notification bar, supports keeping the device on for timer duration, customizer alerts and includes a silent-mode-nagger. Remembers the last time used but is not configurable to remember times.

title: No use as a tea timer - doesn't remember the last time set...
comment: No use as a tea timer - doesn't remember the last time set. When you have added your boiling water, you just want to hit one big GO button, and have the alarm go off n minutes later, without faffing around with presetting the time and pressing Pause beforehand. Perfectly good countdown timer though.
Thanks for the feature request -- this was added last version!

title: Awesome apps.
comment: Very good developer,and open source

title: not just for tea!
comment: When I took OChem, I tried several timer apps during lab experiments.  This one was the simplest to set and use.  Since it only chimes once I didn't have to worry about rushing to the phone to turn off the alarm.  The pleasant tone was a nice change from the jarring alarm-type sounds other timers had.

title: Nice
comment: Uninteresting for me. Thank you anyway, would be better for younger people. :-)

title: Big fat Ali Murray here to give you the best vise you'll ever get ¿???? ¿
comment: This is very good remind you not to forget about what I in the oven, hob or tea your brewing to your taste I think best to leave your tea bag in for 5 minutes make nice taste also never use Yorkshire tea because it has no flavour just very poor tea the same people who make very good coffee I understand why the make the wested tea ever. Have a nice day now please download this app ASAP Because you'll wish you had done this year's go & have fun now

title: does not work
comment: time does not count, too huge letters, partic. in  landscape mode. how long oolong tea? why it's called tea timer? Samsung galaxy tab2

title: It does the job
comment: This app does the job as a timer but it would be great if it could have different timer for each type of tea

title: Just perfect.
comment: The app does what has to. Simple, perfect.

title: Needs some sort of alert
comment: A tea timer is useless if it doesn't alert me to when my tea is ready.

title: Excellent
comment: Fine, lightweight , simple app. It does what it should to do and nothing more.

title: A simple task, apparently, not so simple to make an app for
comment: I was looking for a simple tea timer app. Basically a stopwatch app with at least a tea theme. This app does that, but not without its struggles.  My issues with it are:  It is impossible to "set timer" when the phone is in landscape mode. Even though the app is open, it still drops a notification. I'm right there! Looking at it! What is the need? When the "set timer" screen is pulled up(only works in portrait mode, remember), and the phone changes screen orientation, the timer is reset, or changed to a different time(haven't figured out the "logic" yet).  Overall, for a simple task, all I needed was a trustworthy stopwatch, and that's not what I get with this app. Might be good enough for some, but it is not for me.  I do believe these flaws are simple for the developer to fix.
I've been using this timer through two phone upgrades and it is my first download. Simple and perfect.

title: Good
comment: Adjustable volume be nice - not everyone wants it at the loudest setting. Does remember the last time regardless of what the other reviews say.

title: No presets; won't stop
comment: Elegant simplicity, but it has nothing otherwise to recommend it for tea because there are no presets for different teas. No obvious way to stop the alarm or exit the app.

title: Phone call permissions?
comment: I don't remember this app having such nosey permissions. The app works well and I did enjoy using it, but with the permissions required, uninstalled.

title: Doesn't remember preset
comment: Looks nice but i was looking for something close to a 1 touch timer. No point just duplicating the built in countdown timer. UnInstalled.

title: nice.
comment: my favorite timer app point blank period

title: Works Great
comment: Wouldn't ask for more.  Easy to set default time.  Everything you really need.  One of my favorite apps.

title: Favorite timer app
comment: I've tried other apps but I always come back to this one. It's quick and simple.

title: It just works
comment: Flickable timer might be nice upgrade, otherwise perfect.

title: Works
comment: Does exactly what the description says.
Simple and elegant.
I no when my food is done

title: Not good
comment: Where are the preset tea type times? I want to open the app, press one button and have the right time for my most commonly drank tea start counting down automatically!

title: A Favourite
comment: I've tried many different timers and this is one of the nicest looking  of the radial designs.  It's my default for that reason. Doesn't need more features, but I agree it would be nice if I could scroll to set the timer.

title: Simple, perfect
comment: Does exactly what it claims; counts down to when your tea has sufficiently steeped. Simple, perfect.

title: Great Nap timer too!
comment: Simple timer, grows on you. How could I take my power-naps without it?  Edison, Einstein, all masters of the power nap.  Nap up!

title: Yay
comment: Adorable and functional!

title: Solid
comment: Really great little app for timing your tea.

title: Simple
comment: This is a very simple timer,  indeed. If you take your tea seeped for a while number of minutes, it will suit you to a  . . . T.  If you prefer lots of pre-sets for your green or black teas and herbal infusions, look elsewhere. I deleted those to keep this one.

title: Perfect for my needs
comment: I use this program for my french press coffee everyday. I like the radial visualization  and that it remembers the time set and does not need to be reset with each use, I barely have to look at it to turn it on.  In a word "elegant."

title: Broken
comment: Doesn't work at all on Galaxy Nexus with Android 4.0

title: Simple
comment: It is actually just a simple timer, but it says "tea time" when the time is up. I like that. :-) Presets would be nice though.

title: Slightly Misleading
comment: Very simple to use. However, calling the app Tea Timer is a little misleading with no presets related to tea. Sometimes tedious to set with only +/- controls. None of the features make it stand out.

title: Nice!
comment: Great and open source. What do you want more :) thx to the developer!
Simple to use

title: Nice app.
comment: Too bad it can't save preset timers, so I have to reset each time, and going from 30 to 0 is a chore since it only supports using the +/-
Pretty good. Could have one fewer click to set time,not auto select, allow to use system ringtones.

title: Excellent
comment: Works perfectly on my Galaxy Nexus.

title: Loved this app
comment: but doesn't work on ICS and GNex.

title: cute, and it works
comment: Exactly what I was looking for - thanks!

title: perfect.
comment: just does what it should :)

title: Perfect.
comment: Simple and perfect. If you need bells and whistles look elsewhere.  But if you want a simple countdown timer, you couldn't ask for better.
Fantastic. Timer is flexible with low battery cost and minimalist design. Highly recommend.

title: I don't like it.
comment: It does not have any common tea presets, neither you can save yours.I wonder why it's called TEA timer rather than just timer.Plus it rings only once.

title: Good timer, bad resolution
comment: The timer is exactly what I was looking for.  The only thing I wish is that it fit my phone (Motorola Atrix) full screen.

title: Pretty cool!
comment: Love it!
Does one thing really well.

title: Perfect.
comment: Does one thing very well.

title: Perfect
comment: I use it for cooking, workouts, coloring my hair - everything! Thank you for a simple app with no hidden catches!

title: Pretty much perfect
comment: Exactly what it says on the tin. No more, no less.

title: help please?
comment: HELP tell how do get this alarm stop going on forevr? will not stop, @ all, may hav powr off fone evry time? should uninstall mayb?
My only thing is that I wish that your default alarm notification would appear on the list of alarms.

title: Clean
comment: Probably one of the best looking apps on android. Simple. To the point. Works great.
Perfect KISS example

title: simple and effective app
comment: and I love the clean design

title: Works even when phone sleeps
comment: , which is good (I tried others, and their clock stopped running when the phone's screensaver started (and then beeped when I woke the phone)). Minor nitpick: The icon stays in the top bar after finishing, cluttering that bar (I have to drag it down, select it and press "back" again to make it go away). Since I depend on the bar for seeing three kinds of email, appointments and other stuff, I'd love to eliminate everything that's not doing a job there.
Simple timer I use for special needs students. Visual representation of how much time they have left on their tasks. Would appreciate app2sd.
Misleading name.
Just a timer, nothing to do with tea, no presets.
It's a timer which really has nothing to do with tea. No presets for specific types of teas, so what's the point?
It's a tea timer. Does what it says simply and well. I like that the alarm only sounds once. It is for tea, not to alarm.
If u know your steeping times by heart this app is perfect. Clean interface with a nice countdown graphic. 2 thumbs up.
Loses time on orientation switch. No presets for tea?
great ui! clean, multiple presets. perfect permissions.
Must unlock display to turn off alarm which can be very annoying. Nice simple app otherwise.
Simple app with a modern feel and concise UI. Also has a nice alarm sound. Beautiful.
I time the steeping, then time the cool-down, then time how long the tea is in my mouth for maximum flavor (8 sec).
Finally found a nice looking dead simple timer app. Great job.
Excellent timer! Is there a possibility of have the ticking countdown noise as an option? -EVO 4G
4 stars! Excellent simple app! Please add an exit button for 5 stars :)
works fine.nice countdown animation.
This app saved my marriage and makes sure my turkey comes out perfectly every time.
Beautifully simple.
the alarm doesn't go off when display is off!
Great little app, does exactly what it says, no more, no less
Very nice! Would be great to enable app to SD.
This should be built in. Who couldn't use a good timer? This one's great!
Great timer app. NOT just for tea. Use it almost every day.
Simple. Beautiful. Functional. I wish more apps were this perfect.
Needs a widget.
I use it daily for my tea and other things.
Would be nice to be able to set a duration for alarm to ring for.
Works perfectly and the "ready" tone will not alarm the meditative zone of watching your leaves "dance" Thank you The Tea Docent!
The chime is the perfect, unobtrusive reminder. Before this I was constantly forgetting the tea I had brewing.
Works perfectly :)
I love it does everything its supposed to so far. Awesome. I previously had the twotouchtimer and this is MUCH better, no comparison. Samsung moment.
Just what i wanted. Thanks!
Does just what it says and does it well!
Simple and easy to use. Does exactly what I want it to
This is so cute! I love the chime that goes off when the timer's done. A must-have app for tea lovers :)
Beautiful! Does one thing and does it well.
Beautiful. Simple. Perfect.

simple and useful.
